trans-unit.source: Represents a composite control that has a primary button that responds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Click"></xref> event and a secondary button that displays a drop-down list of mutually exclusive values.
The following illustration shows examples of RibbonSplitButton controls in large, medium, and small variations, and with no images.

![Ribbon split button controls](~/add/media/wpfribbon-splitbutton.png "Ribbon split button controls") Ribbon split button controls The following illustrations show RibbonSplitButton controls when the drop-down is opened.

![Ribbon split button control with drop-down open](~/add/media/wpfribbon-splitbutton-selection.png "Ribbon split button control with drop-down open") Ribbon split button control with drop-down open ![Ribbon split button control with drop-down open](~/add/media/wpfribbon-splitbutton-selection2.png "Ribbon split button control with drop-down open") Ribbon split button control with drop-down open
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the background of the control when it is in the Checked state.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The brush that is used to draw the background of the control when it is in the Checked state.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.CheckedBackground*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the outer border of the control when it is in the Checked state.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The brush that is used to draw the outer border of the control when it is in the Checked state.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.CheckedBorderBrush*> dependency property.
To be added.
Occurs when the button is clicked.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Click"></xref> routed event.
To be added.
Gets or sets the command that is associated with this control.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The command that is associated with this control.
Gets or sets a user-defined data value to pass to the command.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A user-defined data value to pass to the command.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.CommandParameter*> dependency property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Command*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the element on which to raise the specified command.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The element on which to invoke the command.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.CommandTarget*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the descriptive text that is displayed in the ToolTip for the drop-down area of this control.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The descriptive text to display in the ToolTip.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.DropDownToolTipDescription*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the descriptive text that is displayed in the footer of the ToolTip for the drop-down area of this control.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The descriptive text to display in the footer of the ToolTip.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.DropDownToolTipFooterDescription*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the image that is displayed in the footer of the ToolTip for the drop-down area of this control.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The image to display in the footer of the ToolTip.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.DropDownToolTipFooterImageSource*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the title text that is displayed in the footer of the ToolTip for the drop-down area of this control.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The title text to display in the footer of the ToolTip.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.DropDownToolTipFooterTitle*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the image that is displayed in the ToolTip for the drop-down area of this control.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The image to display in the ToolTip.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.DropDownToolTipImageSource*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the title text that is displayed in the ToolTip for the drop-down area of this control.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The title text to display in the ToolTip.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.DropDownToolTipTitle*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for the header area of this control.
A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters.
KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls.
KeyTips appear on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> when you press the ALT key.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The keyboard shortcut for the header area of this control.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.HeaderKeyTip*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a unique identifier that links a ribbon control to a corresponding control in the Quick Access Toolbar.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A unique identifier for a control in the Quick Access Toolbar.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.HeaderQuickAccessToolBarId*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a user can check and uncheck the button.
When this property is `true`, the button behaves as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can check and uncheck the button; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.IsCheckable*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the button is checked.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the button is checked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.IsChecked*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that indicates the relative position of the label for this control.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A value that indicates the relative position of the label.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.LabelPosition*> dependency property.
To be added.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
A new automation peer object for this control.
Builds the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> when a new template is applied.
This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
A new automation peer object for this control.
